settings.question: Shipping update for the UK
settings.answer: We are currently not able to ship our products to the UK. In the meantime, we are doing our best to make this possible again as soon as we can.

settings.question: Why haven’t I received my order information?
settings.answer: Sometimes, your confirmation may take a little longer. If you haven't received your confirmation after one hour, please check your spam filter and that you have provided us with the correct email address. Contact us on store@olafhusseein.com if you checked as mentioned above and still haven't received your order confirmation.

settings.question: When can I expect my order to arrive?
settings.answer: Delivery time depends on your location and local delivery service. Under normal circumstances you should receive your order within The Netherlands in 1-2 working days. Orders sent to the rest of Europe will take 2-5 working days. Worldwide deliveries may take up to 3-7 working days. Please note that during sale periods and holidays it may take longer for your order to arrive.

settings.question: What are the shipping costs?
settings.answer: We offer free shipping on all orders in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, Germany, France, and Denmark. On all other European orders we offer free shipping above €100. Worldwide orders are eligible for free shipping from €200.

settings.question: Where can I check the status of my order?
settings.answer: In the order confirmation, you will receive a link to check the status of your order. You can also check the status of all your orders when you are signed into your account.

settings.question: How can I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer: Once we receive your order, we will send it immediately to our warehouse for shipment. If you wish to modify or cancel your order, please contact us on store@olafhussein.com as soon as possible. We will check the status of your order and determine if any changes can be made. If our warehouse has already processed your order, you will have to wait until it arrives and then make a return.

settings.question: How can I return my order?
settings.answer:
To return or exchange items, please follow these steps: 

1. Go to our return portal via the link  https://code.returns-exchanges.com/olaf-hussein-2 or scan the QR code on the paper that was included in your order. Follow the steps described in the portal. 

2. Place the item(s) you want to return or exchange in a box. Re-use the original packaging if possible and enclose this document with the barcode that came with your order. Tape the package securely. Please note, if the returned item(s) does not meet our return criterias, the return cannot be approved and we will be unable to provide a refund. 

3. Go to your local post office and return your package. Information regarding return labels, carrier services and sending returns back to us will be described in the return portal. Please hold on to your proof of shipment until we have confirmed your return or exchange. 

4. Once we have received and processed your return or exchange, you will receive a confirmation email. Are you returning, you can expect to receive the refund within 3-5 working days after we have processes your return. With some payment methods the refund can take up to 14 days after processing the return. Exchanges will be shipped from our warehouse within 1-2 working days after processing your returned item(s).

Orders must be returned unwashed and unused in the original packaging with all labels still attached.

Non-sale items can also be returned in our flagship store at Bilderdijkstraat 12 in Amsterdam.
 
We will offer a full refund on all items within 30 days of receipt. Unfortunately, we can not refund any taxes duties charges or shipping fees for returns. Refunds will be done in Euros at the price paid upon original purchase.

settings.question: When will I get my refund?
settings.answer: We aim to process your refund within 7 business days after receiving your return. The refund will be made to your original payment method. Please allow up to 5 working days for the refund to appear in your account after we process your return. For some payment methods, the refund process may take up to 14 days after we process your return.
